description:
Joel has become a favorite of mine. He's funny, nice, and intelligent... but on top of that he loves cock. He just gets such a thrill out of pleasuring other guys. And, he loves to get fucked... I mean, he REALLY loves it. You can just see it in his face.
So, I wanted to get him back to do another movie. And who better to pair him up with than another of my favorites... Luke, the hot, straight, married fuck machine? <grin>
title: Joel & Luke
